entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Kingston
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:40 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kingston Airport 04:00 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023
Temperature: 3.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 82 %
Dewpoint: 1.1°C
Wind: SW 40 km/h gust 51 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few showers ending early this morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 late this morning. High plus 4. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High zero.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023
